articles.author: Jamil Anderlini, Clea Caulcutt
articles.title: 'I love you Macron!' French leader gets rock star welcome in China - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president faces fire and fury on the streets of Paris, but in China crowds of students adore him.
articles.content: GUANGZHOU, China French President Emmanuel Macron cemented his status as a rock star on the world stage on Friday as he toured the campus of a top university in southern China accompanied by rapturou… [+2695 chars]
